linkedInData.summary:
Assisting existing clients and creating new clients for First Command Financial Services in Central Florida, with emphasis on helping ROTC Cadets with lifetime financial planning.  Contact me, mobile 706-580-0955 email bjstropp@firstcommand.com.  

First Command is a Texas based 50+ year old company that is owned by its’ Financial Advisors and Employees. First Command’s mission is coaching those who serve in their pursuit of financial security. Our focus continues to be on building trusting Client-Advisor relationships by meeting face-to-face with our client families. We learn what’s important to them; help them establish meaningful and specific goals that reflect their values, and then construct comprehensive financial plans.   

Periodically I post information regarding my employer First Command Financial Services and the social media usage guidelines that apply to First Command also apply to my pages. Please view them here: http://bit.ly/fclinkedinguidelines.

linkedInData.summary:
I began working with Principal Financial in 2022. As a financial professional, my goal is to listen and understand what is most important to you, and then collaborate with you to build a tailored financial strategy to help you work towards achieving your goals. 

I grew up in Red Wing, MN with my 3 brothers and attended Red Wing High School. I then attended Hamilton College in upstate New York where I have a family legacy of over 150 years. 

My passion for understanding what's most important to my clients, developing tailored financial strategies and collaborating with them throughout their lives is what motivates me to strive for excellence in the client experience that I provide to l my clients. 


When not in the office, I thoroughly enjoy exploring nature and travelling internationally, where I've been to 16 countries and am striving for a total of 20 over the next few years. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Let's discuss your goals during an initial financial planning conversation. 
Contact me @ 651-764-3261 or thomas@ggwm.us.

Insurance products issued by Principal National Life Insurance Company (except in NY), Principal Life Insurance Company®, and the companies available through the Preferred Product Network, Inc. Securities and advisory products offered through Principal Securities, Inc., Member SIPC. Referenced companies are members of the Principal Financial Group®, Des Moines, IA 50392. Thomas Hoffman, Principal National and Principal Life Financial Representative, Principal Securities Registered Representative, Financial Advisor. Green Guardian Wealth Management is not an affiliate of any company of the Principal Financial Group®.  2271408-072022

linkedInData.summary:
Bonnie Laffie is an Investment Adviser Representative who works with professionals and businesses to help coordinate their financial plans. She evaluates different options to help her clients achieve their financial goals. Bonnie has teamed up with many CPAs and attorneys to better help her clients with their estate planning, disability, income protection and Long Term Care Insurance programs. Through her dedication and hard work, she has become a lifetime member of the Million Dollar Round Table (MDRT) which is recognized internationally as the standard of excellence in the life insurance and financial services business.

Qualifying membership in the MDRT is based on minimum commission and gross business generated within a year.  Each MDRT status designation is granted for one year only.  All members must apply every year to continue their affiliation with the Million Dollar Round Table.

linkedInData.summary:
Our mission at Capobianco Financial Advisors is to help individuals achieve a greater vision of how wealth can support their path to success.

I have been assisting individuals and business owners in pursuing financial independence for over 37 years.  I was born and raised on Long Island and attended Siena College.  The core component to my business is the client. With that being said, I work hard to create a mutually beneficial and respected long-term relationship with my clients and their families. 

Who do we serve?
Professional Men and Women
Pre-retirees
Retirees
Business owners

I aim to guide individuals by illustrating strategies that help them work toward financial freedom.  By considering one’s risk tolerance level, time horizon and goal objective, we can provide the products and services needed to plan for your future.

What do we offer?
Retirement Planning, Tax Managed Investment Planning, Financial Advice, Wealth Management, Estate Planning, Life Insurance & Long Term Care Planning, Education Funding

Capobianco Financial Advisors continues to grow through referrals from satisfied clients as well as other professionals.  37+ years of experience, personal commitment, dedication, honesty and integrity has affirmed the respect of my clients and colleagues.

We are located at 6 Executive Park Drive, Suite A in Clifton Park NY, 12065.

Please visit my website www.capoassoc.com.  To set up a meeting email me at acapobianco@capoassoc.com.

Investment advisor representative offering securities and advisory services through Cetera Advisor Networks LLC (doing insurance business in CA as CFGAN Insurance Agency) member FINRA/SIPC, a broker/dealer and a Registered Investment Adviser. Cetera is under separate ownership from any other named entity. CA INSURANCE LICENSE # 0D82233.

linkedInData.summary:
My focus is on each client's own specific goals based on well thought-out objectives and risk tolerance. As trusted advisors our obligation is to match your portfolio with these objectives. We ask questions.

I take seriously the requirement to identify experienced managers in the industry to recommend what is appropriate for you and your circumstances.

At Quinn Holdings, LLC our work represents a high standard as measured by personal service, effective goal communication, knowledge of securities, and most of all integrity.

Our mission is to provide targeted portfolio management so your life thrives. It's a process driven strategy.

As an advisor to high net worth families and institutions for more than a quarter of a century, we pay keen attention to detail and continually monitor market issues. The tools we use are not just stocks and bonds but private equity, actively managed closed-end hedge funds, managed futures, and unit investment trusts. Of foremost importance is always risk management.

The Cetera representative associated with this page may only discuss and/or transact business with residents of the following states:

 **Registered States**CA,FL,NJ,PA,NY.

Financial Strategies | Asset Management | Objective Advice

linkedInData.summary:
I have been in the financial services industry since 1981, starting my own firm, "Family Capital Management" in 1999. As the founder and President of Family Capital Management (FCM), I love working with a great team of professionals.  FCM has become one of the leading independent financial advisory and wealth management firms in West Michigan. I am married to my soul mate, Dawn Damon.  We have 8 children and 11 grandchildren. 
My passion is helping clients navigate the challenges of managing their finances to live a life of meaning and significance. With an expertise in philanthropy, I  founded Stewardship Planning Partners (SPP) to help clients live at the intersection of faith and finance, investing their lives and their resources to change the world.

I find playing my guitar is a great way to unwind after a work day. I enjoy writing and recording music, spending time with my wife on occasional walks in our neighborhood, and in Door County, WI. I have a blast playing with my grandkids, and watching sports with my family, when we can all get together.
